EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Building Wall Street Risk Applications_Q316.Confirmat
EmailTemplate.subject: White Paper: Building Wall Street Risk Applications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for downloading Building Wall Street Risk Applications. We hope you found the white paper an informative and helpful resource as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey.
You might also like to take advantage of these additional resources:
- Toward Actionable Information: Transforming Business Results with Big Data and Analytics <[[http://pivotal.io/transforming-business-results-with-big-data-and-analytics]]> - Embarking on the Cloud Native Journey to More Agile IT <[[http://pivotal.io/embarking-on-the-cloud-native-journey-to-more-agile-it]]> - Analytics in the Cloud: Getting The Most Out Of Analytics Deployments <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/analytics-in-the-cloud]]>
Finally, consider joining us in Las Vegas at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io/]]>, August 1–4. SpringOne Platform brings together the people, process and tools for delivering and operating data-driven software services. There will be in-depth advanced technical topics and accessible introductory content covering data science, machine learning, microservices, agile, continuous delivery, devops, and more. Register today <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>.
If you would like more information or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out. Contact us here <[[http://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
